decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.    The proposal, by reason of its siting and design, represents prominent and intrusive features in the Metropolitan Green Belt and along with the cumulative impact of the other telecommunication equipment , results in a detrimental impact to visual amenity in the locality and could result in a proliferation of telecommunications equipment in the area. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policies ENV.1.1 (All New Development), ENV-1.12 (Telecommunications) and ENV 4.4 (Acceptable Development in the Green Belt) of the Unitary Development Plan and Policies ENV-B.1.1(All New Development), ENV-B.1.7 (Telecommunications) and ENV-N.1.2 (Acceptable Development in the Green Belt) of the Revised Deposit Unitary Development Plan and the provisions of Planning Policy Guidance Note 8.
description: Installation of a 15.0m high monopole and radio equipment cabinet (4.1m long x 2.6m wide x 2.9m high).
